details: Can be stacked up to 4 times, once for each unique Resistance character (Except Demons and Xenon) to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Resistance' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 and talk to Checky in the Secret Plaza when prompt with choosing a class

build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Rock 'n Shock - Persist and Guardbreak
  • Support Unit - H-EX - Party Reinforce
  • Salvo - Reinforce and Extra Strike

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Gboy and fuegobagel for their help in making this overview!

primary.name: Crystal Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 40
primary.desc: Throws a rock that deals fixed damage

primary.name: Infiltrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Hide for 30 sec, Movement Speed: +15
primary.desc: Turn invisible preventing touch damage

primary.name: Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Rate: +115%

primary.name: Secret Assembly
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, you move to the Resistance Secret Plaza\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Jet Booster
primary.shortDesc:
Booster Max: 100, All Skill Activation MP Cost: 8
Double Acceleration: While in the air, press the jump or skill key to perform a mid-air jump. Use with the up arrow key to jump upward. Consumes 25 of the booster. Can be used even when not mounted on the Mech, in which case it does not consume any of the booster.
Booster Deployment: While in the air, press the Down key, together with the jump or skill key, to hover in the air at a cost of 25 of the booster per sec.
Mechanic Dash: Press Left twice, Right twice, or, if on the ground, Left/Right plus the skill key to dash in a straight line. If used in the air, consumes 25 of the booster. Cooldown: 0.3 sec.
details:
[Double Jump]: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • If combined with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump
  • Can be used while unmmounted

[Jet Boosters]: While in the air, holding the Down Arrow Key and the Jump Key or Skill Key together will allow you to hover briefly
  • You can move while hovering as long you hold onto the Jump Key or Skill Key

[Mechanic Dash]: Double-tap the Left or Right Arrow Keys to dash forward
  • Can be used in the air
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys

primary.name: Hidden Peace
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +10%

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'End of Special Training'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Humanoid Mech
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Speed When Mounted: 20, Attack Power: 40, Defense: +300\nPermanently increases Max HP and Max MP by 1500
primary.desc: Mount onto your Humanoid Mech
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants flat Max HP/MP
While mounted, gain increased 100% Knockback Resistance, Attack, DEF and Max Movement Speed

primary.name: Gatling Gun
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Damage: 90%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of projectiles: 4
primary.desc: Fires several bullets that pierces through enemies

primary.name: ME-07 Drillhands
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 150% to knocked back enemies.
primary.desc: Dashes forward and pushing back enemies hit

primary.name: Rocket Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50 each (launch and land), Damage: 300%, Max Enemies Hit (upon landing): 6
primary.desc: Launches upwards before falling back down
details: Can be used to propel up to platforms above you
Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Attack Key together
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys

primary.name: Heavy Gatling Gun
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 160%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of projectiles: 6
primary.desc: Fires several bullets that pierces through enemies

primary.name: Homing Beacon
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 65, Damage: 210%, Max Enemy Hit: 4 at once
primary.desc: While held, launches homing missiles that seek out nearby enemies
details: Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first while in Tank Mode (3rd Job)
Can be used while using other skills
Right-clicking the skill toggles the smoke visual effect ON/OFF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Mechanic Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Weapon Mastery: +50%, Critical Rate: +15%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Mechanic Rage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Attack Speed increased for 180 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Open Portal: GX-9
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Portal Duration: 300 sec, cannot be used for 2 seconds after use.
primary.desc: Places down a portal that allows you and your party members to freely move between
details: 2 portals within range of each other must be placed for them to function
There is a brief cooldown after using a portal before they can be used again
Right-clicking the skill toggles party member use ON/OFF

primary.name: Perfect Armor
primary.shortDesc: Ability One - While mounting your mech, it has a 20% chance to guard against attacks (permanent)\nAbility Two - Reflects 500% damage back to enemies (when skill is active)
primary.desc: While active, reflect back damage taken
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants a chance to dodge attacks when mounted on your mech

primary.name: Robo Launcher RM7
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Robo Launcher Duration: 70 sec, Damage: 250%, Self-Destruct Damage: 400%
primary.desc: Places down a stationary sentry that attacks enemies in front of it
details: At the end of the duration, the sentry explodes dealing damage to nearby enemies
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Tank Mech
primary.shortDesc: Tank Mode MP Cost: 50 plus 10 MP every 5 sec, Normal Attack Damage: 100%\nRegular Attack MP Cost: 20, Additional Critical Rate: +30%\nHoming missile's final damage is reduced to 60% of the original damage.
primary.desc: Mount onto your Tank Mech
details: fires additional missiles at each enemy instead of one but deals reduced %Final Damage
While in Tank Mech, you gain increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Heavy Salvo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 35, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 4, Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Fires a barrage of bullets forward
details: Usable only in Humanoid Mode
Shares the same SP and Key Slot as

primary.name: AP Salvo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 6, Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Fires a concentrated bullet that pierces enemies
details: Usable only in Tank Mode
Shares the same SP and Key Slot as
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Support Unit: H-EX
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Deploys H-EX and reduces Defense of monsters on the map by -10% for 80 sec. Restores 8% of HP for you and nearby party members every 5 sec. After skill duration ends, self-destructs inflicting 500% damage.\n[Passive Effects - Status Resistance: +40, Elemental Resistance: +40%]
primary.desc: Places down a stationary robot that debuffs all enemies and restores %Max HP to nearby allies every few seconds
details:
[Debuff]: Reduces %DEF
  • Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF
[Passive]: Permanently increases your Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
At the end of the duration, the robot explodes dealing damage to nearby enemies

primary.name: Punch Launcher
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 1, Enemies Hit with Knock-back Attack: 10.
primary.desc: Launches a fist forward that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Overclock
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: 39%, Critical Rate: 20%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Roll of the Dice
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 200 sec
primary.desc: Grants a buff depending on the number rolled
details: [One]: Reduces cooldown of by 50%
[Two]: Increases %DEF
[Three]: Increases %Max HP/MP
[Four]: Increases %Crit Rate
[Five]: Increases %Damage
[Six]: Increases %EXP Rate

primary.name: Rock 'n Shock
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, When 3 coils are placed - Tesla Coil Duration: 70 sec, Damage: 200%, Max Monsters Hit: 10, Self-Destruct Damage: 550%
primary.desc: Place down 3 robots that continuously attack and stun enemies
details: At the end of the duration, the robots explode dealing damage to nearby enemies
If no robots are active, pressing the Down Arrow Key with the Skill Key will place 3 robots at once
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Advanced Homing Beacon
primary.shortDesc: Homing Beacon Damage: +300%
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Mechanized Defense System
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +30%, Max MP: +30%, DEF: +750, Damage Ignored: 15%

primary.name: Battle Program
primary.shortDesc: Humanoid Mech Speed: +10, Rocket Booster Recoil Distance decreases, Mechanic Dash Movement Range increases

primary.name: Heavy Salvo Plus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 390%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Fires an explosive blast forward
details: Usable only in Humanoid Mode
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as

primary.name: AP Salvo Plus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, First Hit has Damage: 285%, Number of Attacks: 6, Enemies Hit: 6.\n2nd Explosion: Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 1
primary.desc: Fire an explosive bullet that pierces enemies
details: Usable only in Tank Mode
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
Upon hitting an enemy, the bullet explodes damaging nearby enemies
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Giant Robot SG-88
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 400, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8. Damage to Nearby Enemies: 1300% per sec, Number of Attacks: 2. Invincible for 3 sec after using the skill.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Tap the Attack Key to charge up and release a devastating attack
details: Charging will increase the %Damage dealt
While charging, you are invincible
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Enhanced Support Unit
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage +7% for yourself and all your party members, self-destruction damage increased to 1100%, auto-recovery range increased.
details: Now grants %Final Damage to you and your party members and the auto-recovery ranged has been increased
%Damage of self-destruct has also been increased

primary.name: Bots 'n Tots
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Robot Factory Duration: 70 sec, Max Toy Robots Summoned: 3 toy robots. Summon Interval: Every 3 sec., Self-Destruct Damage: 1000%\nToy Robots' Self-Destruct Damage: 500%\n
primary.desc: Places down a robot factory that deploys robots that chase enemies and self-destructs
details: At the end of the duration, the robot factory explodes dealing damage to nearby enemies
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Homing Beacon Research
primary.shortDesc: Bonus Homing Beacon missiles: +5
details: Increases the number of homing missiles fired

primary.name: Extreme Mech
primary.shortDesc: Hop on your Humanoid Mech for these effects. Attack Power: +55, Defense: +600\nWeapon Mastery: +70%

primary.name: Robot Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +45%.\nRobot's Final Damage and Final Self-Destruct Damage: +105%, Summon Duration for skills aside from 5th skills: +40%.\n<Robo Launcher RM7> Damage: +135%p.
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF that allows skill effect transparency to apply to robot skills affected by Robot Mastery

primary.name: Double Down
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, 50% chance of rolling a Double Down, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
details: Grants a chance to roll two dices at once

primary.name: Mech Alloy Research
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 15%, Damage Taken -30% upon failure to dodge\nThis skill permanently increases Max HP by 40% and Max MP by 10%.
primary.desc: Grants a dodge chance and increases %Damage Reduction
details: Additionally, permanently increases %Max HP/MP

hyperPassive.desc: Increases the %Damage of and

hyperPassive.desc: Increases the number of enemies hit by

hyperPassive.desc: Increases the number of hits per attack of

hyperActive.name: Full Spread
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 10 sec to fire 6 additional shots.\nHoming Beacon's damage decreased to 60%, does not stack with the damage reduction from Tank Mech.\nCooldown: 90 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Increases the number of homing missiles fired from
details: Deals reduced %Damage similar to but damage reduction does not stack

hyperActive.name: Distortion Bomb
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 250, Duration: 4 sec., Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 8 sec
hyperActive.desc: Fires a special bomb that continously damages enemies in an area
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: For Liberty
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Doomsday Device
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 750, the summoned machine lasts 125 sec and its arsenal includes Gatling guns and missiles
Gatling Gun - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 6, Cooldown: 1.5 sec
Missiles - Fires 2 missiles to hit up to 12 enemies, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 3, Cooldown: 8 sec
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a turret that follows you and attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Mobile Missile Battery
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Launches a battery that fires 38 micro missiles at up to 15 enemies.\nMicro missiles deal 850% damage 5 times.\nCooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases a canister of missiles that unloads on nearby enemies
details: Prioritize bosses with the highest HP first

fifthMain.name: Full Metal Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, Can down-key for up to 10 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 11.
When Homing Beacon is used during casting, 7 additional Beacons are fired, can be stacked with Full Spread.
Cannot use Homing Beacon for 2 sec after skill ends.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a gigantic mech that fires and bursts down enemies in front of you
details: You are invincible while casting but you cannot move or change directions

Can fire while casting
  • Fires additional homing missiles while active
  • Multi-target will not have any %Final Damage reduction
  • You cannot use for a short period after casting this skill

fifthMain.name: Mecha Carrier
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1250. Summons a Mecha Carrier for 70 sec.
9 carrier-based aircraft(s) attack, then return. With each charge after that, 1 additional carrier-based aircraft(s) will join the sortie. Up to 16 carrier-based aircraft(s) can attack in total.
Carrier-Based Aircraft: Attacks the targets 4 time(s) with 500% damage, then returns.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a stationary air carrier above you that fires homing aircrafts at enemies
details: Each time the aircrafts hit an enemy, an additional aircraft will spawn (up to 16 max)
If you move too far, the air carrier will teleport to your location
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: HEXA Heavy Salvo Plus
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 745%, Number of Attacks: 4

masteryCore.name: HEXA AP Salvo Plus
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 105, fires armor-piercing shells\n1st hit - Max Enemies Hit: 7, Piercing Damage: 570%, Number of Attacks: 6\n2nd explosion - Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 390%, Number of Attacks: 3

originSkill.name: Ground Zero
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1800, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2040%, Number of Attacks: 8, Number of Earthquakes: 10, then Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1980%, Number of Attacks: 15, Number of Explosions: 32
Massive Bombardment - Duration: 30 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Bombardment Damage: 2888%, Number of Attacks: 15
Cooldown: 360 sec

notable.name: HEXA Heavy / AP Salvo Plus 6th Job

meta: Mechanic is DEX pirate class part of the Resistance class group. What makes Mechanics unique is their ability to ride and attack on their mech and deploy different kinds of utility
